name: places/ChIJ4cirfbtZwokR8HazXnklQp0
adrFormatAddress: 170 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Pedicure was very average, but 5+ stars for the chair massage! All of my back problems solved in under 10 mins

text.text: Pedicure was very average, but 5+ stars for the chair massage! All of my back problems solved in under 10 mins

originalText.text:
For a gel manicure this place would get a 1 star, but because my pedicure was quite relaxing and comfortable I must give the overall review three stars.

My partner received a gel manicure from someone who had trouble applying the polish. She was also given a shoulder massage when she sat in the chair, which may be some people’s preference, but she does not like that and wasn’t asked before being touched. Her nails also peeled off in the shower just a week later and we paid for a proper gel polish service.

Truly, my pedicure was great. Between the massage chair (that was surprisingly effective) and my service with a foot massage that left my feet feeling soft smooth and relaxed, if this was the only reason we went I would have given them 4 stars.

originalText.text: I was very impressed by the cleanliness and service here. I read the varying reviews and wasn’t sure what to think. But I decided to go in anyways. They sat me immediately for a pedicure, followed all sanitation requirements and the facility itself felt clean and well maintained. The woman who did my pedicure was also lovely. Would recommend!

text.text: I was very impressed by the cleanliness and service here. I read the varying reviews and wasn’t sure what to think. But I decided to go in anyways. They sat me immediately for a pedicure, followed all sanitation requirements and the facility itself felt clean and well maintained. The woman who did my pedicure was also lovely. Would recommend!

originalText.text: Got a powder french manicure. They didnt have a normal french pink - had sparkles in it. She also didnt file them down enough after dipping. Too thick. Also did not do consistent size white tips on each nail. Some were way thicker than others. Lastly she did a gel top coat ?? Never seen this done with a powder manicure. The gel top coat started peeling after a couple of days. Ruined the manicure. For $120 ??? wont be coming here again…

originalText.text:
I LOVE SpaBelles and am gutted my life doesn’t take me down to Chelsea as much anymore.  They are easily the best nail salon in NYC.

And tonight, Christina gave me the unicorn nails of my dreams!  They are perfect!!

Thanks so much!!
